definitions.definition: The act or result of measuring.
To ascertain the quantity of a unit of material via calculated comparison with respect to a standard.
definitions.example: We measured the temperature with a thermometer.   You should measure the angle with a spirit level.

definitions.definition: To be of (a certain size), to have (a certain measurement)
definitions.example: The window measured two square feet.

definitions.definition: To estimate the unit size of something.
To obtain or set apart; to mark in even increments.
To traverse, cross, pass along; to travel over.
To adjust by a rule or standard.
To allot or distribute by measure; to set off or apart by measure; often with out or off.
